name: Dice escape (Jellogramming)
description:
You wake up in a strange, abandoned-looking place. You must escape this place, or you will perish alone.

If you can't see a part of the game or the game is too small in full screen mode, try zooming out or in on the webpage with ctrl+ and ctrl- (command+ and command- on mac).

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move and left click to launch dice.
